column1: Cuando me topo con algún tipo tocón siempre marco las distancias.
column2: When I come across a guy who's handsy, I always keep my distance.
column5: <built-in method toPlainText of QTextEdit object at 0x000001B699046708>

column1: Harry tuvo que sujetarse con brazos y piernas a su cuerpo para no r[?] hacia atrás por la huesuda grupa.
column2:
Harry had to hang on with his arms and legs against his (thestral's) body to keep from sliding backwards off the bony rump/hindquarters.
---
esbalar
column5: <built-in method toPlainText of QTextEdit object at 0x000001B699046708>

column1: Todos iban pegados cuanto podían al cuello de sus monturas para protegerse de la estela que dejaba el thestral de Harry.
column2: They all clung as closely as they could to the necks of their mounts to protect themselves from the wash (wake) left by Harry's thestral.
column5: <built-in method toPlainText of QTextEdit object at 0x000001B699046708>
column6: estela also contrail/trail, slipstream, tail of comet, trail of destruction

column1: ¿Quién te tiñe el cabello? Esas mechas te quedan perfectas.
column2: Who colours your hair? Those highlights really suit you.
column5: <built-in method toPlainText of QTextEdit object at 0x000001B699046708>

column1: Él tenía las piernas entumecidas de tanto apretarlas contra las ijadas del thestral, pero no se atrevía a cambiar de postura por si resbalaba...
column2: His legs were numb from pressing them against the thestral's flanks (sides), but he didn't dare change his position in case he slipped....
column5: <built-in method toPlainText of QTextEdit object at 0x000001B699046708>

column1: El animal seguía surcando el cielo con decisión, sin apenas mover las alas.
column2: The animal continued to soar through the sky with determination, barely moving its wings.
column5: <built-in method toPlainText of QTextEdit object at 0x000001B699046708>

column1: Surca y lija la madera laminada antes de pintarla.
column2: Score and sand the plywood before painting.

column1: usó un martillo y un cincel para partir el ladrillo en dos pedazos
